skillTree.localised_description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.
The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.
When intoned, this ritual text holds back decay so the Tomb Kings' souls can be bound to their mortal remains once more.

effects.description:
[HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
	(all armies)

skillTree.localised_description: There are specialised rituals, chants and incantations for drawing forth dead spirits and binding them back into their corporeal forms; this one knows them all.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing your way around the Realm of Souls, along with knowledge of the required ritual incantations, are essential skills for the dedicated Liche Priest.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: A toxic spray of acid jets forth from the spine of Tomb Scorpion's tail.
When freed of the burden of his entombed body, the spirit of Serkhet is free to commune with those around him, carrying forth the wisdom of Tahoth.
The patron deities of Serkhet have taken a healthy interest in him, and woe betide any who should cross their desired fate for the Entombed One.
Returned from the grave as a scorpion, Serkhet has forever after been blessed by the Scorpion God.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +6 for Tomb Scorpion units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The pincers of Serkhet glow with the magic of Nehekhara, increasing their vicious and penetrating power.
Blessed from beyond the grave by Sokth, Serkhet summons his power whenever the battle lust of the Tomb Scorpion is not upon him.
It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.
Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.
As the names of Usirian are invoked, skeletal hands burst forth from beneath the sand to drag the foe to their graves.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_name: Bound Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades
skillTree.localised_description: Imbued with the essence of the God of Death, the Nehekharans' blades strike with supernatural force to harvest souls for Djaf.

effects.description: Ability: "Bound Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Bound Djaf's Incantation of Cursed Blades

skillTree.localised_description: Sword-blows are mysteriously turned away as Ptra's wife reaches out to shield Nehekhara's warriors from evil.

skillTree.localised_name: Bound Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting
skillTree.localised_description: When the verses are spoken, a fierce light emanates from the Undead's empty eye-sockets, enabling them to strike with supernatural speed and fury.

effects.description: Ability: "Bound Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Bound Ptra's Incantation of Righteous Smiting

skillTree.localised_name: Bound Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm
skillTree.localised_description: A whirlwind of skulls tears across the battlefield, devouring all in its path in the Goddess of the Green Moon's bitter, vindictive name.

effects.description: Ability: "Bound Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Bound Sakhmet's Incantation of the Skullstorm

skillTree.localised_description: Every syllable strips moisture and saps vitality from the bodies of Usekhp's unfortunate victims.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
